Description: Steatite shabti of Padiamenipy with a lappet-wig, a modelled face(damaged), an incised collar and crossed hands holding two incised hoes; the leg section is inscribed with five(remaining) rows of Hieroglyphic text; the lower leg section is lost.
Condition: incomplete - damage to the face; lower leg section lost
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Walter Llewellyn Nash (Executors of)
